mapper.select: SELECT u.id uid,u.username userName,u.`password` passWord,u.realname realName,u.address, u.dept,u.phone ,ur.rid ,r.`name` rName from `user` u left join user_role ur on ur.uid = u.id left join role r on r.id = ur.rid WHERE username=#{username} and u.is_delete = 0

SELECT u.id uid,u.username userName,u.`password` passWord,u.realname realName,u.address, u.dept,u.phone, u.sex,
( case when u.sex =0 then '男' else '女' end ) sex2, r.`name` rName ,r.id rid FROM user u left JOIN user_role ur on ur.uid = u.id left JOIN role r on r.id = ur.rid WHERE u.is_delete = 0
SELECT u.id,u.realname realName from USER u WHERE u.is_delete = 0
SELECT ur.rid from user_role ur WHERE ur.uid = #{id}
